pathAssistantSteps.info: When you have received ownership of this lead, you as a user, should move this to engaging to start in the lead conversion process.

As a QUT CCE Lead, the following actions need to be completed before you can convert this lead

  • Contact Details
  • Company Details
  • Description
This lead needs to be assigned to a Sales agent.
This stage is used to push marketing to a lead when they advise that they are not ready to engage QUT.
Congratulations! Now itâ€™s time to convert the lead record to an opportunity. Then, continue the qualification process with your new contact.
